text:
Did you know a short novel's called
a "novella"? It's true! Anyhoo, you
wrote a note SO LONG, it felt like
a novella. Impressive. THEN I saw
there was a prezzie, and that is
DOUBLE impressive!

Thank you so much for your letter.
I could tell you really meant it.
You even got me a gift! Ohmigosh!
I was literally. On. The. Floor. If
I'm ever feeling lousy, I'll totes
read your note again to cheer up!

Thank you for the BEST fan letter
ever! Also I was TOTALLY freaking
out about the gift you sent with it!
You know how to make me feel
like a real pop star!

Thanks for the message! I've read
it over so many times since I got it.
For real. So many times. Hold on.
There. I read it again just then.
Later? After I send this? I'm going
to read it again!

That message you sent was so, so,
so, SO nice. I felt amazing after
reading it! Thank you sooooooo
much! I'm going to keep it with
me 24/7 as a good-luck charm!

I read your note and it made me
so, so, so, so, so, so, so, so, so,
SO happy, I almost cried! Let's
be friends forever, OK?
